Package org.firstinspires.ftc.teamcode.helperClasses.bezierCurves

Class TVector

java.lang.Object
org.firstinspires.ftc.teamcode.helperClasses.bezierCurves.TVector
public class TVector extends Object
The TVector class represents the row vector matrix comprised of a polynomial for the matrix representation of a spline. This is NOT the Vector class.
Eq: [1, t, t^2, t^3...] * P * C; where P is the characteristic matrix of the spline/curve while C is the control parameters

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    TVector(int controlPointCount)
    Constructs a ParametricRowVector with the number of control points a spline has.
    TVector(int controlPointCount, int differentiationLevel)
    Construct a ParametricRowVector using two numbers: the number of control points a spline has, and the number of differentiations (including the 0th diff)

  • Constructor Details

    • TVector

      public TVector(int controlPointCount, int differentiationLevel)
      Construct a ParametricRowVector using two numbers: the number of control points a spline has, and the number of differentiations (including the 0th diff)
      Parameters:
      controlPointCount - the number of control points a spline has
      differentiationLevel - the number of differentiations that can be requested (positional, velocity, acceleration, jerk... etc.)

    • TVector

      public TVector(int controlPointCount)
      Constructs a ParametricRowVector with the number of control points a spline has. The default differentiation level (including the 0th diff) is 3.
      Parameters:
      controlPointCount - number of control points a spline has

  • Method Details

    • reload

      public void reload()
      Recompute what should be cached

    • initializeCoefficientArray

      public void initializeCoefficientArray()
      Initializes the coefficient array (for later processing) and cache them. Each row is a different level of differentiation.

    • getRowVector

      public Matrix getRowVector(double t, int diffLevel)
      This method gets the t-vector at the specified differentiation level.
      Parameters:
      t - t value of the parametric curve; [0, 1]
      diffLevel - specifies how many differentiations are done
      Returns:
      t vector

    • getTMatrix

      public Matrix getTMatrix(double t, int diffTo)
      Generates a matrix where each row is a differentiation level
      Parameters:
      t - t value
      diffTo - the number corresponds to first, second, third... etc. derivative
      Returns:
      a matrix of t vectors
